page.title: 17SHEERNESS - THE OLAU LINE
page.content: THE{OLAU LINE}COMPANY HAS BEEN OPERATING SINCE 1981. IT IS A MAJOR EMPLOYER ON THE ISLAND OF SHEPPEY. THE OLAU LINE OWNS 4 SHIPS WHICH GO FROM SHEERNESS TO{VLISSINGEN IN {HOLLAND,GERMANY AND SWEDEN. THE OLAU HOLLANDIA AND THE OLAU BRITANNIA ARE THE BIGGEST OF THEIR KIND.THEY ARE THE ONLY SHIPS WITH AN INDOOR SWIMMING POOL,SAUNA AND A SOLARIUM. THEY ALSO HAVE A RESTAURENT BUFFET AND A CAFETERIA. THERE IS A DUTY-FREE MARKET AND GAMING TABLES,AN ARCADE,A CHILDREN'S PLAYROOM AND VIDEO FILMS,ALSO DISCO MUSIC. ALL CABINS ARE FULLY AIR-CONDITIONED AND HAVE A SHOWER. MANY PEOPLE FROM SHEERNESS GO TO HOLLAND ON THE CHEAP-WEEKEND (Â£69) OFFERED BY THE OLAU LINE OR BARGAIN BREAKS (Â£20). MANY DUTCH PEOPLE COME OVER ON MARKET DAY TO SELL CHEESE.
